thread.title: Burger King is giving away sex toys in their new “Adult Combo Meals” (2 Photos & Video)
thread.title_full: Burger King is giving away sex toys in their new “Adult Combo Meals” (2 Photos & Video)

author: Garrett
title: Burger King is giving away sex toys in their new “Adult Combo Meals” (2 Photos & Video)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
We’re a day away from Valentine’s Day and what better way to wow your date than with an Adult Combo meal from Burger King, complete with an “Adult Toy.” I mean, there is no better way to tell your date “I love you” than with a Whopper, fries, and a set of fuzzy handcuffs, right? 
While the full details of what you can expect to find inside are still a little unclear, it looks as if the included toys skew a bit on the “tamer” side of the spectrum. With the teaser only showing a blindfold, a feather tickler, and a head massager, you shouldn’t be expecting to immerse yourself in the full “Fifty Shades of Grey” experience. 2 
As of right now, this promotion is only available in select locations across Israel for one day only. While you may not be near any of these locations this year, rest easy knowing that this promotion may find its way into a BK near you if it proves successful. 
Check out the full promotion below to see what the fuss is all about: 3
